rostopic hz /camera/color/image_raw
rostopic hz /mavros/global_position/global
rostopic echo /mavros/global_position/global
start point:
-11.360347121953964, 44.9785798182711, 23.809718887756414, 0.025699523168826944, -0.04288979492717268, -0.01]

##########edge##############################
rostopic hz /drone_state_1
rostopic hz /drone_image_1
rostopic hz /target_bbx_1

#####capture########
kazam:change file name, save to 5g-bag/third_party
flatpak run fr.handbrake.ghb

###topics####
drone gps:
rostopic echo /drone_gps_2

drone state:
rostopic echo /drone_state_2

drone image:
rostopic hz /drone_image_1
##
balloon initial position:
rostopic echo /drone_state_10
rostopic echo /drone_gps_10

###experiment1:

[30.26621717929493, 120.11962829794267]

[30.266390781547322, 120.11963669786809]

  y: 42.9018380232
[30.266214743014707, 120.11967296440889]

    x: -12.0
    y: 55.0
    z: 0.0
[30.266320442852717, 120.11951812005233]

[30.26565852379571, 120.11976602992272]
